## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (16e498da56ba3ac37ec6acbd7071d8192a3f4dec256f42c022d79157d0b92196)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'majidalfuttaim' @ 1.1.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
